title: Manage Site Laydown Area
description: A large piece of equipment (a pressure vessel) is arriving on site and the logistics coordinator must assign it a space in the laydown yard.

tasks.description: Check the laydown yard management system for available space.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent views a map of the yard and identifies an open, suitable space.

tasks.description: Reserve the selected space for the incoming pressure vessel.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reserves the space, and it now shows as 'Occupied' in the system.

tasks.description: Notify the field supervisor and the transport company of the assigned location for unloading.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a notification with a map and coordinates for the unloading spot.
